remarks: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for an integral: if ` y ` is (effectively) not free in ` A ` and ` B ` , it is not free in ` S. A B _d x ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
statement:
nfitg.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
nfitg.2 $e |- F/_ y B $.
nfitg $p |- F/_ y S. A B _d x $.
$d x y $.
